text: Bernardino de Sahagún (1499 – October 23 1590) was a Spanish Franciscan missionary and priest to the Aztec (Nahua) people of Mexico. He is best known as the compiler of the Florentine Codex, also known as (General History of the Things of New Spain). Category:1499 births Category:1590 deaths Category:Spanish writers Category:Christian missionaries Category:Franciscans
title: Bernardino de Sahagún
